Report_Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Huh? Your pouch is full.


I want to give you a shield, but you've got
to make some space in there first!
Step1_Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The tumbleweeds really are a nuisance...


If I sweep them away, they come right
back. I don't have any idea what I can
do to clean it all up.<sp:5:1:0>
Report_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Now that all of the tumbleweeds are
gone, I can handle cleaning up the rest
of this by myself. Leave it to me!
Ready_Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>This is a real pile of garbage, isn't it?<sp:5:1:0>
Hard not to be upset at the sight.

I spotted it during my travels, and the
sight bothered me so much, I couldn't
help stopping to clean it up.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I believe that we travelers have a duty to
protect the beauty of nature and not sully
it with trash!<sp:5:1:0>
Yep. When I leave a place, I want it to be
cleaner than when I arrived.

That's why I even travel with a broom,
as you can see.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Unfortunately, these tumbleweeds keep
rolling in. There's just no end to it.
I can't keep up!<sp:5:1:0>
I do want to leave this place cleaner
than when I arrived, so I can't just
overlook all of this.<sp:5:1:0>
I think I could make progress here
if only these tumbleweeds didn't
keep tumbling in...<sp:5:1:0>
Step1_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The tumbleweeds kept rolling up and
rolling up... I got tired trying to stay on
top of all of them.<sp:5:1:0>
I could try again tomorrow.<sp:5:1:0> But I want to
sweep away some of them, at least...

*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>I just wish there was a way to
get rid of them all...<sp:5:1:0>
Report_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>There you are! This is the reward I meant
to give you before.

Can you believe I found this while
I was cleaning?
Step1_Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If I could clean up all the tumbleweeds,
then I could clean up everything else,
piece by piece.<sp:5:1:0>
I'm going to need to work at it until it's
all done, no matter what.<sp:5:1:0>
Report_Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh! Did you clean them all up?


There were so many. Wasn't that a lot of
work? Thank you so much.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Please, take this. It's something special
I found while I was cleaning.
Report_Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh! You cleaned them all up?


<sp:3:0:2:0700>I spotted them during my travels, and the
sight bothered me so much, I couldn't
help stopping to sweep up.
I believe that we travelers have a duty
to leave no trash behind as we goâ€”we
should protect the beauty of nature.<sp:5:1:0>
For me, that means leaving a place
cleaner than when I arrived.

That's why I even travel with a broom,
as you can see.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>But in all my travels, I've never had
someone do my cleaning for me!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Please, take this. It's something special
I found while I was sweeping.
